items.title: Mindful Leadership Practices For Busy, Distracted Leaders

The research on mindfulness is clear. It improves resilience, the capacity to collaborate, and the ability to lead in complex conditions. But for it to work, you must commit.
If becoming more mindful is one of your New Year’s resolutions, or even if you’re just curious about the topic, you’re not …
